name: Analgesics
description: Relieves pain like headaches, arthritis, and muscle aches effectively.

name: Antipyretics
description: Reduces fever by promoting heat loss from the body.

name: Antibiotics
description: Kills or stops bacteria growth to treat infections efficiently.

name: Antivirals
description: Treats viral infections like flu, herpes, and HIV quickly.

name: Antifungals
description: Heals fungal infections on skin, nails, and internal areas.

name: Antiparasitics
description: Treats infections from parasites like worms and protozoa easily.

name: Cardiovascular
description: Supports heart conditions including blood pressure and rhythm problems.

name: Antidiabetics
description: Controls blood sugar levels for diabetic patients effectively daily.

name: Respiratory
description: Treats asthma, bronchitis, and other respiratory health conditions properly.

name: Central Nervous System
description: Affects brain and spinal cord to manage neurological conditions.

name: Gastrointestinal
description: Strengthens or suppresses immunity to treat immune-related diseases effectively.

name: Immunological Agents
description: Strengthens or suppresses immunity to treat immune-related diseases effectively.

name: Hormonal
description: Balances hormones for thyroid, growth, and reproductive health issues.

name: Pediatric Medicines
description: Formulated specifically for infants, children, and adolescents.

name: Gynecological/Obstetric
description: Support women's reproductive health and pregnancy care.

name: Cancer (Oncology)
description: Used to treat cancer by killing or slowing the growth of cancer cells.

name: Ophthalmic Medicines
description: Treat eye-related conditions such as infections, dryness, or glaucoma.

name: Ear, Nose, Throat
description: Manage conditions of the ear, nose, and throat, including infections and allergies.

name: Musculoskeletal Drugs
description: Used for muscle, bone, or joint conditions like arthritis and inflammation.

name: Dermatological Drugs
description: Treat skin issues such as acne, eczema, fungal infections, or rashes.

name: Dental Medicines
description: Used to manage oral health issues including infections, pain, and gum disease.

name: Nutritional & Dietary Supplements
description: Support health with vitamins, minerals, and nutritional enhancements.

name: Diagnostic Agents
description: Aid in identifying diseases or conditions through tests and imaging.

name: Emergency / First Aid Drugs
description: Critical drugs for quick response in emergency and life-threatening situations.
